subject: FROM IRS COMMISSIONER Mrs Stel
body:
FROM IRS COMMISSIONER Mrs Stella Johnson U.S.A IRS Address:1111
Constitution Ave,NW Washington, DC 20874
Greetings From The Internal Revenue Service United States of
America.Your total funds worth $8.5 million USD will be delivered to
your home address through any company of your choice from the below
mentioned so kindly update us with:
We hereby officially notifying you about the present arrangement to
pay you, your over due Winning Prize/inheritance fund which you could
not complete the process of the released of your transfer pin code
through the Digitized Payment System. and you have spend a lot of
money and a lot time sending money to different people just to make
sure you receive your fund and after set and done your received
nothing. We have decided to pay your funds through (ATM VISA Card)
This arrangement was initiated/constituted by the World Bank, United
Nation and Paris Club, due to fraudulent activities going on within
the world,The World Bank, United Nations and Paris Club introduced
this payment arrangement as to enable our Contract ,Winning
Prize,inheritance beneficiary to receive their fund without any
interference,
The ATM VISA Card was contracted and powered by GOLD CARD WORLD
WIDE.The ATM VISA CARD is credited with the sum of $8.5 Million united
states dollars , it is already loaded in the Master Card which you can
use to access your fund in any ATM Stand/location worldwide and we
have concluded delivery arrangement with the below courier services
companies and their delivery time is stated below.
1; UPS=5hrs/$150, Amazon Steam wallet card or buy an iTunes card $150
scratch of the label and send me the picture
2; FedEx=8hrs/$100, Amazon Steam wallet card or buy an iTunes card
$100 scratch of the label and send me the picture
3; DHL=12hrs/$50, Amazon Steam wallet card or buy an iTunes card $50
scratch of the label and send me the picture
To enable the deliver proceed immediately today, Note that you will be
liable to pay the delivery fee of your ATM VISA Card with any of the
above courier company of your choice before the delivery will take
place to your destination address, 
Kindly provide me with the below
details in your response to this email and let me know which courier
company you would want us to use for the shipment of your ATM VISA
Card to you.
2. Full Names:
3. Country:
4. Phone Number:
5. Occupation:
6. Age:
7. Sex:
Reply this email with the ITUNES CARD and the below contact details
immediately you receive this email for immediate shipment of your
funds.
Yours Sincerely,
IRS Commissioner,
Mrs Stella Johnson

subject: Re: FROM IRS COMMISSIONER Mrs Stel
body:
Hello Mrs Stella Johnson,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised and excited about this news! It's not every day that one hears about such a large sum of money coming their way.

I have a few questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned something about an ATM VISA Card being loaded with the funds. How does that work exactly? And how can I be sure that the card will be safe during delivery?

Also, you mentioned several courier services - UPS, DHL, and another one which wasn't very clear in your message. Could you please clarify this for me? 

Lastly, regarding the ITUNES CARD, could you explain why it's needed in this process? I'm not very familiar with how these things work.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Andrew

subject: Re: FROM IRS COMMISSIONER Mrs Stel
body:
Attn Sir, I received your message and The ATM card works like bank ATM
card, It is issued by the bank and it works perfectly

I want you to be very sure and I am given you ðŸ’¯% assurance and guarantee
that the ATM card will be safe during delivery as I have documents for back
up from here to your destination address

I mentioned several courier companies which will use to deliver to you
safely, like

1) UPS, It will cost you only $150.00usd
2) FedEx, It will cost you $100.00
3) DHL, It will cost you $50.00 USD

Above are the courier/ delivery company and you are advise to choose one
and pay the delivery fees through buying A gift cards, like You can buy
itunes card, apple gift cards, Amazon steam wallet card

Once you choose the courier/delivery company, you should buy the gift card
and scratch and send it here for urgent delivery Mrs Stella Johnson, Thank
you
